name: Railway hell
description:
Movement - WASD

Shoot - LMB

Ability - RMB

Do you like cowboys? And the trains? There are both trains and cowboys in this game. Playing Railway hell, you will have to help the cowboy take revenge on the train for knocking down your favorite tumbleweed. Collect upgrades, dodge bullets and destroy this train!

P.S. please do not alt+tab

Authors:

Me(https://sea-breeze.itch.io)
